statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={200.8}{e}^{{{0.0215}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0215}}\approx{1.0217327903374}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0217327903374}-{1}={0.021732790337382}\approx{0.0217} and the percent is 2.17.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
